Inputs {.sidebar}
------------------------------------

### Histogram Inputs
```{R}


# Select a variable for histogram
selectInput(inputId = 'HistVariable', 
            label = 'Select Variable for Histogram', 
            choices = c("dep_delay", "arr_delay", "air_time", "distance"))



# Slider for bin size
sliderInput(inputId = 'BinSize', 
            label = 'Select Bin Size', 
            min = 5, max = 50, value = 25)



# Choose a color for the histogram
selectInput(inputId = 'HistColor', 
            label = 'Choose Histogram Color', 
            choices = colors(), 
            selected = "skyblue")
```
